arenaWidth.description: Width of arena measured in units

isArenaWidthLocked.description: Flag specifying if the width of arena is fixed for this game type

arenaHeight.description: Height of arena measured in units

isArenaHeightLocked.description: Flag specifying if the height of arena is fixed for this game type

minNumberOfParticipants.description: Minimum number of bots participating in battle

isMinNumberOfParticipantsLocked.description: Flag specifying if the minimum number of bots participating in battle is fixed for this game type

maxNumberOfParticipants.description: Maximum number of bots participating in battle

isMaxNumberOfParticipantsLocked.description: Flag specifying if the maximum number of bots participating in battle is fixed for this game type

isNumberOfRoundsLocked.description: Flag specifying if the number-of-rounds is fixed for this game type

gunCoolingRate.description: Gun cooling rate. The gun needs to cool down to a gun heat of zero before the gun is able to fire

isGunCoolingRateLocked.description: Flag specifying if the gun cooling rate is fixed for this game type

maxInactivityTurns.description: Maximum number of inactive turns allowed, where a bot does not take any action before it is zapped by the game

isMaxInactivityTurnsLocked.description: Flag specifying if the inactive turns is fixed for this game type

turnTimeout.description: Turn timeout in microseconds (1 / 1,000,000 second) for sending intent after having received 'tick' message

isTurnTimeoutLocked.description: Flag specifying if the turn timeout is fixed for this game type

readyTimeout.description: Time limit in microseconds (1 / 1,000,000 second) for sending ready message after having received 'game started' message

isReadyTimeoutLocked.description: Flag specifying if the ready timeout is fixed for this game type

defaultTurnsPerSecond.description: Default number of turns to show per second for an observer/UI
